activities:
Bullhorn is a Software as a Service Customer Relationship Management (CRM) platform with analytics, back office, and messaging capabilities. Bullhorn allows its customers  to enter and manage information, including personal information, of their respective clients, candidates and/or prospects into the system ("Customer Data"). In this capacity, Bullhorn is the data processor and does not determine the control or scope of the data, that is entered. Bullhorn's customer is the data controller per the terms of our Master Subscription Agreement. Bullhorn only uses Customer Data for purposes of providing our customer's with the Bullhorn Service.

Bullhorn also collects personal information from visitors to the www.bullhorn.com website who request further communications from the company. This information is used internally by Bullhorn for marketing and communication purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data submitted by Bullhorn customers to the Bullhorn Service relative to customer's candidates, clients and prospective clients; human resources data; personal data entered by visitors to the Bullhorn marketing website
